EmailTemplate.name: Monitoring - Results Attached
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Trademark Monitoring Report
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As part of your Trademark Monitoring Subscription, we monitor the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) database for new Trademark applications that may conflict with your Trademark.
Please review your attached Trademark monitoring report carefully for any listings that you feel are too close to your Trademark. As a Trademark owner, you have the right to file an opposition to any application that you believe might harm your mark or your business.
If you would like to file an opposition, you may want to speak first with an attorney about your options. With the Business Legal Plan , you can ask an attorney questions about your specific matter and on an unlimited number of new business or intellectual property matters for a low fee.*
If you have any questions or would like additional information, please call us at (800) 773-0888 Monday–Friday from 6 a.m.–7 p.m. PT or email us at customercare@legalzoom.com.
We appreciate you choosing LegalZoom.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
* Available in most states.
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
